label: uncl4221
comment: Code specifying the identification used to define the nature of a discrepancy.

values.label: Item discontinued by wholesaler
values.comment: The wholesaler no longer offers the ordered product.

values.label: Item no longer produced
values.comment: The item ordered has been discontinued and is no longer in production.

values.label: Over-shipped
values.comment: Code indicating that there was an excess quantity of goods in a shipment relative to the order.

values.label: Item out of stock at manufacturer
values.comment: The item is out of stock at manufacturer.

values.label: Delivered but not advised
values.comment: Shipment or goods have been delivered without any advance notification of delivery.

values.label: Goods delivered damaged
values.comment: Part or all of the goods in a shipment were delivered damaged.

values.label: Delivered too late
values.comment: Delivered but at a later date than the delivery date under the agreed conditions or stipulated in the order.

values.label: Next higher packaging quantity
values.comment: The ordered item has been, or is to be, packed to the next higher packaging quantity.

values.label: Available now - no shipping schedule
values.comment: The material is available for shipment but there is no authorization for movement known.

values.label: Available now - scheduled to ship (date)
values.comment: The material is available for shipment and is committed for shipment/delivery at a future date.

values.label: Back ordered from previous order
values.comment: An order is being held as no material is available to fulfil the requirement.

values.label: Shipment partial - back order to follow
values.comment: A portion of the previous order is being held as open, as enough material was not available to fulfil the requirement.

values.label: Customer inquiry - all items
values.comment: The response includes information concerning all of the issues included in the prior inquiry.

values.label: Shipment complete
values.comment: The quantity dispatched fulfilled the order quantity.

values.label: Shipment includes extra items to meet price break
values.comment: The quantity dispatched exceeds the order quantity to accommodate a quantity of scale price model opportunity.

values.label: Customer inquiry - shipped items only
values.comment: The response includes information addressing only of the items dispatched that were included in the prior inquiry.

values.label: Cancelled from previous order
values.comment: Amount deleted from the earlier schedule.

values.label: Shipment complete with additional quantity
values.comment: The quantity dispatched exceeds the ordered quantity.

values.label: Customer inquiry - unshipped items only
values.comment: The response includes information addressing only the items that have not been dispatched, that were included in the prior inquiry.

values.label: Shipment partial - considered complete, no backorder
values.comment: The quantity shipped is less than the amount authorized and there is no plan to ship the remaining amount.

values.label: Shipment complete with substitution
values.comment: The quantity and product shipped, though not exactly matching the original order, is compliant with and fulfils the expectation.

values.label: Item cancelled
values.comment: The material previously ordered is no longer needed.

values.label: Item represents substitution from original order
values.comment: The quantity and product shipped is compliant with the expectation.

values.label: Last shipment (date)
values.comment: The date that the most recent material dispatch was made.

values.label: Not yet published
values.comment: The product requested is not publicly available at this time.

values.label: Not in process - no shipping schedule
values.comment: The product requested is neither available nor in process, as there is not an authorization to manufacture product.

values.label: Not in process - schedule to ship (date)
values.comment: The product requested is neither available nor in process. A planned dispatch date has been provided.

values.label: Order sent to factory for production (date)
values.comment: The product requested is not available. The schedule has been forwarded to manufacturing for inclusion on this date.

values.label: Item sent to factory for production (date)
values.comment: The product has been moved to the manufacturing area and scheduled for completion on the following date.

values.label: Out of print
values.comment: Item is no longer available.

values.label: Item out of stock because of strike or force majeure
values.comment: Item is not available due to strike or an unforeseeable event.

values.label: Item out of stock at wholesaler
values.comment: Item is not available at the distribution point.

values.label: Purchase order inquiry - all items
values.comment: The response includes information concerning all of the articles included in the prior inquiry that had been requested by the contact initiator.

values.label: Purchase order complete
values.comment: The amount fulfilling the requirements of the contract.

values.label: Purchase order inquiry - shipped items only
values.comment: The response includes information concerning all of the articles that were dispatched and included in the prior inquiry that had been requested by the contact initiator.

values.label: Packed-to-date (date)
values.comment: Quantity represents the amount processed and ready for shipment at this date.

values.label: In process - no shipping schedule
values.comment: This amount is being manufactured in anticipation for a possible authorization for shipment.

values.label: Purchase order inquiry - unshipped items only
values.comment: The response includes information concerning all of the articles that were not dispatched and included in the prior inquiry that had been requested by the contact initiator.

values.label: Purchase order inquiry - specific items
values.comment: The response includes information concerning a unique sub-set of the total list of articles that the contract initiator had requested information on.

values.label: In process - scheduled to ship (date)
values.comment: This amount is being manufactured in anticipation for a possible authorization for shipment.

values.label: Item rationed
values.comment: Product is restricted because of limited availability.

values.label: Shipped-to-date (date)
values.comment: Cumulative amount shipped through this date.

values.label: Scheduled for production at factory
values.comment: Product is anticipated for manufacture on this date.

values.label: Split shipment
values.comment: Shipment is only part of the ordered quantity.

values.label: Item temporary discontinued by wholesaler
values.comment: Product is, for the time being, not available from the distribution point.

values.label: Unsolicited report
values.comment: The product information was provided voluntarily.

values.label: Pack to closest complete logistic packaging quantity
values.comment: Pack to the closest complete logistic packaging quantity.

values.label: Pack to next lower complete logistic quantity
values.comment: Pack to the next lower complete logistic packaging quantity.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
